American Young takes three-shot lead after second round in DubaiCameron Young carded an eight-under-par 64 to claim a three-shot lead after the second round of the Dubai Desert Classic at the Emirates Golf Club on Friday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 14:27:13 GMT EEO235VVERIZTAEXW62SDBBZCQ https://www.reuters.com/sports/golf/american-young-takes- Three-shot-lead-after-second-round-dubai-2024-01-19/Reuters运动的高尔夫球
Japan starts precision landing of 'moon sniper' SLIM spacecraftJapan gave the green light for its spacecraft to make a "precision" landing on the moon on Friday, its bid to become the world's fifth country to achieve a moonshot and revitalise a space programme that has suffered a wave of recent setbacks. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 13:36:32 GMT XOHD3NEWQNKCHBZDPMQDEQHSNA https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/japan-starts- precision-landing-moon-sniper-slim-spacecraft-2024-01-19/Kantaro Komiya技术空间
Rust-free Swiatek grateful for demanding start at Australian OpenWorld number one Iga Swiatek believes the stiff tests she has faced at the outset of her bid to claim a maiden Australian Open title have helped her shake off the rust as she prepares for a third-round match against Linda Noskova on Saturday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 13:08:19 GMT HZS3ODRT5ZLTPDN3C75S3DDFRFE https://www.reuters.com/sports/tennis/rust-free-swiatek-grateful-demanding-start-australian-open-2024-01-19/Reuters运动的网球
Chinese embassy warns of plastic surgery risks in South KoreaChina's embassy in Seoul has warned citizens against the dangers of having plastic surgery done in South Korea, from the risk of death to major facial changes that make it difficult to pass through immigration checks. Kremlin says it regrets Argentina's decision not to join BRICS, hopes it reconsidersThe Kremlin said on Friday it regretted Argentina's decision not to join the BRICS bloc of developing nations and hoped that Buenos Aires would reconsider.
